edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster
Interface BatchClusteringMethod<T extends Clusterable<T>>

All Superinterfaces:
ClusteringMethod<T>, ClusterList<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
DistanceMatrixBatchClusteringMethod<T>, SampleInitializedBatchClusteringMethod<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BatchAgglomerativeClusteringMethod, BatchHierarchicalClusteringMethod, RandomOrderedBatchAgglomerativeClusteringMethod
public interface BatchClusteringMethod<T extends Clusterable<T>>
extends ClusteringMethod<T>

A clustering method that needs the complete set of samples on hand in order to operate.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel

Method Summary
 void createClusters()
          Add the given samples to the set to be clustered, and remember the mapping from sample to cluster
